alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Delaware; Hardin; Logan; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 1:18AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF LOGAN COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO, NORTHWESTERN DELAWARE COUNTY IN CENTRAL OHIO, NORTHEASTERN AUGLAIZE, HARDIN COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO AND NORTHERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 200 AM EDT... At 118 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cridersville to North Lewisburg, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bellefontaine, Wapakoneta, Kenton, Ada, Fort Shawnee, Richwood, Cridersville, Forest, Russells Point, Lakeview, Dunkirk, Alger, Waynesfield, Belle Center, West Mansfield, Chippewa Park, Northwood, Blanchard, Roundhead and Mount Victory. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 113 and 118. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
